summary: APK Download feature fully tested. Backend: 12/12 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All APK UI elements verified. Feature displays GitHub release info (version v4.0.4, size 89.5 MB) with download button. Regression tests for products and image upload also passed.
critical_code_review_comments: APK endpoint correctly fetches from GitHub API and caches in store_settings collection
Frontend conditionally renders APK section only when data is available (apk && ...)
Download button opens in new tab with noopener/noreferrer for security
data-testid attributes properly added for testability: apk-download-section, apk-version, apk-download-btn
seed_data_creation: None - APK data fetched from GitHub releases
context_for_next_testing_agent: APK Download feature implemented and tested. Backend: GET /api/store/latest-apk fetches from GitHub releases API (tommyfalls2011/sma2026-1), caches version in store_settings collection, returns {version, download_url, filename, size_mb, published_at, release_name}. Frontend Home.jsx: Fetches on mount, conditionally renders download section if download_url present. Current version: v4.0.4, 89.5 MB. All data-testid attributes in place for UI testing.

frontend: Homepage loads - PASS: Hero title visible
APK download section visible - PASS: data-testid='apk-download-section'
